custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ( SELECT groupId AS tempGroupId, articleId AS tempArticleId, MAX(version) AS tempVersion FROM JournalArticle WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND (classNameId = ?) AND ( (articleId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (version = ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(title) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (content LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (type_ = ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (structureId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (templateId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (displayDate >= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (displayDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ( (status = ?) AND (reviewDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ) [$GROUP_BY_CLAUSE$] ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN JournalArticle ON (TEMP_TABLE.tempGroupId = JournalArticle.groupId) AND (TEMP_TABLE.tempArticleId = JournalArticle.articleId) AND (TEMP_TABLE.tempVersion = JournalArticle.version)
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle WHERE (classNameId = ?) AND (status = ?) AND (expirationDate <= ?)
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle WHERE (classNameId = ?) AND (reviewDate >= ?) AND (reviewDate <= ?)
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle WHERE (resourcePrimKey = ?) AND (displayDate <= ?) AND (status = 0) AND (indexable = [$TRUE$]) ORDER BY version DESC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM ( SELECT groupId AS tempGroupId, articleId AS tempArticleId, MAX(version) AS tempVersion FROM JournalArticle WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND (classNameId = ?) AND ( (articleId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (version = ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(title) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (content LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (type_ = ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (structureId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (templateId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (displayDate >= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (displayDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ( (status = ?) AND (reviewDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ) [$GROUP_BY_CLAUSE$] ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN JournalArticle ON (TEMP_TABLE.tempGroupId = JournalArticle.groupId) AND (TEMP_TABLE.tempArticleId = JournalArticle.articleId) AND (TEMP_TABLE.tempVersion = JournalArticle.version) ORDER BY id_ ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalFeed WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (feedId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {JournalFeed.*} FROM JournalFeed WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (feedId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ORDER BY feedId ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalStructure WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (structureId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {JournalStructure.*} FROM JournalStructure WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (structureId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ORDER BY structureId ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalTemplate WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (templateId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (structureId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {JournalTemplate.*} FROM JournalTemplate WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (templateId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (structureId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ORDER BY templateId ASC
